description: Amendment to Closing Time: All required supporting documentation and submission must be submitted by March 21, 2023, at 14:00 EST.
full_summary:
_____________________
**Tender Announcement: Fixed Base Operator Services**
===============================

**Reference Number:**
WS3885073133 - Doc 3904713342

**Publication Date:**
2023-03-06

**Tender Closing Date:**
2023-03-21T14:00:00

**Contract Details:**
-------------------

* **Contract Title:** Fixed Base Operator Services - Pearson International Airport
* **Procurement Category:** Service
* **Contract Period:** 2023-03-10 to 2024-03-31
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)

**Contracting Entity:**
----------------------

* **Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5 Canada

**End-User Entity:**
-------------------

* **Name:** Canada Border Services Agency - (Administered Activities) (CBSA)
* **Address:** 191 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON K1P 6M7 Canada

**Trade Agreements:**
-------------------

* This tender is open to bidders who can provide services under various free trade agreements, including NAFTA, CETA, CFTA, and others.

**How to Bid:**
----------------

Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and a Statement of Capabilities by the tender closing date of March 21, 2023 at 14:00 EST. 

Please visit the following link for more information and to access the tender package:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15608789?extsite=MTU2MDg3ODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information:**
------------------------

* **Name:** Stanley Chui (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** N/A
* **Fax:** N/A


Note: I have removed the infomation for the notice URL as the link had extra characters that might break during the response. You can remove it or replace with the correct URL. 

### 

Let me know if this rewritten entry meets your requirements!  If you need any further assistance, please don't hesitate to ask. 

Best regards
